name: Swimming
content:
Description

You are made for the water and can swim at surprising speeds with the aptitude of a fish. This might be the result of hard core training, or it may stem from a racial trait, such as webbed feet and hands.

Effect

You gain a swimming speed equal to your base speed and do not need to make any special action rolls to maintain this base speed.

data.data-description: You are made for the water and can swim at surprising speeds with the aptitude of a fish. This might be the result of hard core training, or it may stem from a racial trait, such as webbed feet and hands.
data.data-effect: You gain a swimming speed equal to your base speed and do not need to make any special action rolls to maintain this base speed.
